conversations.content: I bought running shoes today but I'm not sure if I applied the discount. If not, could you refund that order and rebuy them for me using my available discount?

<function_thought>
The user wants to check if a discount was applied to their recent purchase of running shoes. If not, they want the order refunded and repurchased using an available discount. To start, I need to check the order history to find the relevant order for "running shoes" purchased today. First, I should determine the current date using the get_current_day tool.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The current date is 2024-05-19. Now, I need to check the order history to find the order for running shoes purchased today. I will use the view_order_history tool to retrieve the order details.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[view_order_history()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<function_thought>
I found the order for running shoes purchased today. The order ID is ORDER-113219, product name is "SpeedStep Running Shoes", and the product ID is P023. Next, I need to check the invoice for this order to verify whether a discount was applied. I will use the get_invoice tool with the order ID.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-113219")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<function_thought>
The invoice for the order has been sent to the email inbox. I need to retrieve the invoice details from the unread emails. I will use the get_shopping_linked_unread_emails tool to access the email content.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails()]</function_call>

<function_call>[refund_order(order_id="ORDER-113219")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<final_answer></final_answer>
